text: Aña "Anya" Sofía Corazón is a fictional superheroine created by Marvel Comics, she made her first appearance on Amazing Fantasy #1 (August 2004) and later makes many debuts on many other Marvel comic books (including the Spider-Man comics). She was created by Fiona Avery, Jaime Mendoza, Victor Olazaba and Mark Brooks. == Fictional character biography == She is the Latina daughter of a Puerto Rican father and a Mexican mother. Anya Corazón was known as the first Araña and then as the third Spider-Girl. == In other media == Anya Corazon / Spider-Girl made her cinematic debut in Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse (2023), and is played by Isabela Merced in the Sony's Spider-Man Universe (SSU) movie Madame Web (2024). Category:Marvel Comics superheroes
title: Anya Corazon
